description: Detects scheduled task creation using "schtasks" that contain potentially suspicious or uncommon commands
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Software installers that run from temporary folders and also install scheduled tasks are expected to generate some false positives
name: Suspicious Command Patterns In Scheduled Task Creation
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\schtasks.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/Create\ *") AND (((((process.command_line.text:("*\/sc\ minute\ *" OR "*\/ru\ system\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*cmd\ \/c*" OR "*cmd\ \/k*" OR "*cmd\ \/r*" OR "*cmd.exe\ \/c\ *" OR "*cmd.exe\ \/k\ *" OR "*cmd.exe\ \/r\ *"))) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ \-decode\ *" OR "*\ \-enc\ *" OR "*\ \-w\ hidden\ *" OR "*\ bypass\ *" OR "*\ IEX*" OR "*.DownloadData*" OR "*.DownloadFile*" OR "*.DownloadString*" OR "*\/c\ start\ \/min\ *" OR "*FromBase64String*" OR "*mshta\ http*" OR "*mshta.exe\ http*")))) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*\\AppData\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*%AppData%*" AND process.command_line.text:"*%Temp%*" AND process.command_line.text:"*%tmp%*" AND process.command_line.text:"*C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/xml\ C\:\\Users\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*cscript*" AND process.command_line.text:"*curl*" AND process.command_line.text:"*wscript*"))))
